articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: When an Air India flight crashed into a medical campus, surviving doctors rushed to save lives - Politico
articles.description: “I was safe. So I thought, whatever I can do, I should," one said.
articles.content:
There was fire and many were injured, said Chaudhary.
He said he felt lucky to survive but knew he had a task at hand. He rushed to the hospitals intensive care unit, where the injured, most of whom… [+2575 chars]
